snippet: The Serbian police have detained nine people accused of setting fire to the United States Embassy in Belgrade in 2008 during riots against Kosovo’s independence.
abstract: Serbian police detain nine people accused of setting fire to the United States Embassy in Belgrade in 2008 during riots against Kosovo’s independence and are searching for at least five more suspects.
lead_paragraph: The Serbian police have detained nine people accused of setting fire to the United States Embassy in Belgrade in 2008 during riots against Kosovo’s independence.

headline.main: Serbia: 9 Arrests Tied to U.S. Embassy Fire
headline.print_headline: Serbia: 9 Arrests Tied to Embassy Fire
